name: Avantica
description:
At Avantica, we believe technology can change the world. We are proud to be a part of this transformation, and contribute to its evolution by empowering our talent to always seek higher challenges.
We leverage a nearshore advantage that let's us provide software engineering and technology services that are well-suited for both established and startup software companies.
Our model brings the best of all worlds together: partner-centric, distributed Agile, English bilingual, U.S. time-zones, and an obsession with quality that results in solid, creative software solutions across the software development lifecycle.
Now with offices in New York City, we've been headquartered in Silicon Valley for more than 25 years, and have engineering centers throughout Latin America (Costa Rica, Peru, and Bolivia).
